Source file src/github.com/haraldrudell/parl/ev/dataevent.go

Documentation: github.com/haraldrudell/parl/ev 

     1  /*

     5  
     6  package ev
     7  
     8  // DataEvent is an event with an empty interface data value.
     9  // The goroutine defines an exported unique type that it sends using ctx.Send(payload).
    10  // The main evvent loop checks the type of the pyload against the exported unique type
    11  type DataEvent struct {
    12  	EmptyEvent
    13  	payload interface{}
    14  }
    15  
    16  var _ Event = &DataEvent{}
    17  
    18  // NewDataEvent creates an event with payload of a single data value
    19  func NewDataEvent(gID GoID, payload interface{}) (evt Event) {
    20  	return &DataEvent{*NewEmptyEvent(gID), payload}
    21  }
    22  
    23  // Payload returns the data value of a DataEvent
    24  func (ev *DataEvent) Payload() (payload interface{}) {
    25  	return ev.payload
    26  }
    27  

Build version go1.17.8.
